name: Hex Rush Ultra
description:
Left and Right arrow keys to move, Shift to run, Z key to Jump

Hex Rush Ultra

Super fast arcade platformer. Collect hexes as you maneuver through levels filled with spikes and saw blades!

  • 40 different levels!
  • fast paced gameplay!

For leaderboards, play on kongregate!


Game won't load on chrome by default. Use firefox or download the game!
